import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Tag } from '../shared/models/tag'; import { FoodService } from '../services/food/food.service'; @Component({ selector: 'app-tags', templateUrl: './tags.component.html', styleUrls: ['./tags.component.css'] }) export class TagsComponent { tags: Tag[] = [] constructor(private foodservice: FoodService) { } ngOnInit() { this.tags = this.foodservice.getAllTag(); } }
